item.description:
What's New in 0.9.0

  • Add .claude to .gitignore
  • Add HTTP proxy configuration support
  • Add async test for FFmpeg installation path validation and enhance ffmpeg path detection logic (#145)
  • Improve string compilation process (#142)
  • Enhance SelectionMonitor to track mouse-down context and improve selection handling; update APIKeySectionWithTest to conditionally show clear key button; refine button styles in ProcessorRow for consistency (#140)

What's New in 0.8.13

  • Add async test for FFmpeg installation path validation and enhance ffmpeg path detection logic
  • Improve string compilation process (#142)
  • Enhance SelectionMonitor to track mouse-down context and improve selection handling; update APIKeySectionWithTest to conditionally show clear key button; refine button styles in ProcessorRow for consistency (#140)

What's New in 0.8.12

  • Remove deprecated localization entries and streamline Qwen3 ASR model variant handling
  • Sort provider dropdown and add i18n for new strings
  • Add StreamingAsrManager to Parakeet alongside EOU streaming
  • Add Qwen3 ASR model variant support (f32 + int8) with debug logging
  • Improve string compilation process (#142)
  • Enhance SelectionMonitor to track mouse-down context and improve selection handling; update APIKeySectionWithTest to conditionally show clear key button; refine button styles in ProcessorRow for consistency (#140)

item.title: 0.6.0-beta.3
item.description:
What's New in 0.6.0-beta.3

  • Add localization support across the application
